abstract: Robert L. Nardelli said that he wanted to move faster and more efficiently with Chrysler’s turnaround strategy.
snippet: Robert L. Nardelli said that he wanted to move faster and more efficiently with Chrysler’s turnaround strategy.
lead_paragraph: AUBURN HILLS, Mich., Aug. 6 — Robert L. Nardelli, officially named as Chrysler’s new chief executive, said today that he wanted to move faster and more efficiently with the turnaround strategy meant to revive the struggling auto company.

headline.main: Ex-Home Depot Chief Taking Reins at Chrysler
headline.print_headline: Ex-Home Depot Chief Taking Reins at Chrysler

byline.original: By Micheline Maynard and Nick Bunkley

abstract: Robert L. Nardelli, ousted from Home Depot amid shareholder discontent, has been picked to lead Chrysler by its new owner, Cerberus Capital Management.
snippet: Robert L. Nardelli, ousted from Home Depot amid shareholder discontent, has been picked to lead Chrysler by its new owner, Cerberus Capital Management.
lead_paragraph: AUBURN HILLS, Mich., Aug. 5 — Robert L. Nardelli, who was ousted as chief executive of Home Depot amid shareholder discontent this year over his enormous pay package, will soon take on one of the most prominent jobs in corporate America: revitalizing the troubled automaker Chrysler LLC.

headline.main: Ex-Home Depot Chief to Take Reins at Chrysler
headline.print_headline: Ex-Home Depot Chief Taking Reins at Chrysler

byline.original: By Micheline Maynard and Nick Bunkley

abstract: Robert L. Nardelli, who was ousted as chief executive of Home Depot this year amid shareholder discontent over his enormous pay package, will soon take on one of the most prominent jobs in corporate America: revitalizing the troubled automaker Chrysler.
lead_paragraph: Robert L. Nardelli, who was ousted as chief executive of Home Depot this year amid shareholder discontent over his enormous pay package, will soon take on one of the most prominent jobs in corporate America: revitalizing the troubled automaker Chrysler.

headline.main: Ex-Home Depot Chief to Lead Chrysler
